Control Name: Identifies Confidential Information for Destruction—Procedures are in place to identify confidential information requiring destruction when the end of the retention period is reached.

control_attributes.Control: Identifies Confidential Information for Destruction—Procedures are in place to identify confidential information requiring destruction when the end of the retention period is reached.
control_attributes.SubCategory: C1.2 The entity disposes of confidential information to meet the entity’s objectives related to confidentiality.
